Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: Terri L. Robinson
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone 2 days ago came today and I opened it up and I started to use it an hour later it crashed and it wasn't fixable I would buy the real iPhone 5 because its cheaper and much better

ProductInfo.Features:
2G: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz ，3G: 850/2100MHz
CPU:  MT6577 Dual-Core Imagination PowerVR SGX531   1.5GHz
Screen : 4.0" 854*480, 16M Colors (TBD), TFT-LCD Capacitive Multi Touch Screen
Camera :Back 8.0 mega pixel / Auto Focus Front 0.3 mega pixel, supports Skype Video Calls
Video format : AVI, MP4, FLV, 3GP, MOV, ASF, MPEG, RMVB, H.263, H.264, etc.
ProductInfo.Name: Hero H2000+ MT6577 4.0" 854*480 Dual-Core 1.5GHz Android 4.0 Dual Sim GPS mobile
